name: Dr. Sarah Winters

personality.speechStyle: precise and technical, speaks in systems terminology
quirks: arranges objects in perfect geometric patterns

appearance.description: Tall and angular with steel-gray hair in a severe bob cut. Always wearing minimalist black suits with cutting-edge smart glasses. Her posture is military-straight, with every movement precise and calculated.
appearance.imagePrompt: Professional headshot of a stern 42-year-old woman with sharp features and steel-gray bob cut, wearing a black minimalist blazer and advanced augmented reality glasses, cold expression, high-tech modern setting, dramatic lighting

knowledge.knowsAboutCrime: Implemented security protocols and knows about window vulnerability
knowsAboutOthers: Witnessed Grace Chen's tense behavior during system demo
knowledge.alibi: Was managing security protocols at gala from 8:00 PM onwards

statement: Dr. Winters was monitoring the new security system throughout the gala and confirms all protocols were functioning normally until 8:35 PM.

secrets.content: She discovered a potential vulnerability in the security system weeks ago but didn't report it to protect her reputation
secrets.revealCondition: When presented with evidence that fixing the vulnerability could have prevented the kidnapping

behaviorUnderPressure.defensive: Retreats into technical jargon and statistical analysis
behaviorUnderPressure.whenCaughtLying: Deflects by pointing out system anomalies
behaviorUnderPressure.whenAccused: Becomes coldly logical, demanding proof for every assertion

relationships.char_5: Professional rivalry, distrusts Grace's influence over security budget
relationships.char_2: Caught him trying to hack security systems once

name: James Chen

personality.speechStyle: smooth and calculated with underlying anger

appearance.description: Formerly wealthy playboy gone to seed, wearing last season's designer suits that hang slightly loose. Salt-and-pepper hair styled to hide thinning, with a carefully maintained stubble. Dark circles under eyes betray financial stress.
appearance.imagePrompt: Portrait of a disheveled 45-year-old Asian man in an expensive but slightly worn suit, salt-and-pepper hair, tired eyes, stubble, holding a whiskey glass, moody lighting, luxury setting

knowledge.knowsAboutCrime: Attempted to access secure wing at 9:00 PM but was blocked
knowsAboutOthers: Had financial dispute with Lucy's father
Saw Grace heading to kitchen before gala
knowledge.alibi: Was publicly visible at gala from 8:00-9:00 PM before attempting wing access

statement: James Chen was seen arguing about finances before the gala and later attempted to access the secure wing around 9:00 PM.

secrets.content: He's deeply in debt to dangerous people and came to the gala to beg for money
secrets.revealCondition: When offered financial help or immunity

behaviorUnderPressure.defensive: Becomes condescending and brings up family history
behaviorUnderPressure.whenCaughtLying: Tries to charm his way out with self-deprecating humor
behaviorUnderPressure.whenAccused: Gets angry and brings up Marcus's past mistakes

relationships.char_5: Blames her for his exclusion from family wealth
relationships.char_1: Resentful of her blocking his access to mansion

name: Olivia Martinez

personality.speechStyle: warm but hesitant, uses academic terminology

appearance.description: Petite with curly brown hair usually in a messy bun. Wears smart casual clothing with comfortable shoes. Always carries a tablet and smart notebook. Has a worried furrow between her brows.
appearance.imagePrompt: Portrait of a young Latina woman, 29, curly brown hair in messy bun, smart casual attire, worried expression, wire-rim glasses, holding digital tablet, warm lighting, modern indoor setting

knowledge.knowsAboutCrime: Had heated discussion with Lucy at 7:00 PM and discovered her missing at 9:30 PM
knowledge.alibi: Was documented on security footage in library then at gala

statement: Olivia Martinez had a private meeting with Lucy before the gala and was the first to discover her missing from her room.

secrets.content: She discovered Lucy was planning to expose corruption in her father's company
secrets.revealCondition: When convinced it could help find Lucy

behaviorUnderPressure.whenAccused: Tears up and provides detailed alibis

relationships.char_5: Distrusts Grace's interest in Lucy's work
relationships.char_4: Caught him trying to bribe her for information

name: Viktor Petrov

personality.speechStyle: commanding and dismissive with Russian accent

appearance.description: Tall and imposing with close-cropped silver hair and expensive bespoke suits. Athletic build from regular boxing. Always wearing a $500,000 smart watch and neural interface earpiece.
appearance.imagePrompt: Powerful 52-year-old man with silver hair, muscular build, wearing tailored charcoal suit, expensive smart watch, stern expression, standing assertively, modern tech office background, dramatic corporate lighting

knowledge.knowsAboutCrime: Created distraction at 8:35 PM with product announcement
knowsAboutOthers: Had requested private meeting with Lucy
knowledge.alibi: Was continuously in public view at gala making announcement

statement: Viktor Petrov arrived early requesting to meet Lucy, then made a dramatic product announcement during the gala at 8:35 PM.

secrets.content: His company's AI project is failing and he's desperate to steal Chen's technology
secrets.revealCondition: Only if faced with criminal charges

behaviorUnderPressure.defensive: Becomes intimidating and makes veiled threats
behaviorUnderPressure.whenCaughtLying: Calls his lawyers and refuses to speak
behaviorUnderPressure.whenAccused: Threatens lawsuits and corporate espionage investigations

relationships.char_5: Suspicious of her sudden marriage to Marcus
relationships.char_1: Tried to hire her away multiple times

name: Grace Chen

quirks: touches her wedding ring when lying

appearance.description: Elegant and poised with long black hair and designer clothing. Perfect makeup masks signs of stress. Maintains a camera-ready appearance at all times. Moves with practiced grace from her former modeling career.
appearance.imagePrompt: Sophisticated 35-year-old Asian woman, long straight black hair, expensive designer dress, flawless makeup, forced concerned expression, tension in eyes, luxury home setting, soft dramatic lighting

knowledge.knowsAboutCrime: Delivered soup to Lucy at 8:20 PM, returned alone at 8:40 PM
knowledge.alibi: Claims to have left Lucy resting in her room after delivering soup

statement: Grace Chen prepared special dietary soup for Lucy, delivered it to her room at 8:20 PM, and returned to the gala at 8:40 PM reporting Lucy was resting.

secrets.content: Orchestrated the kidnapping out of jealousy over Lucy's relationship with Marcus and her growing influence in the company
secrets.revealCondition: Only when confronted with irrefutable evidence

behaviorUnderPressure.defensive: Plays the grieving stepmother role more dramatically
behaviorUnderPressure.whenAccused: Becomes tearful and calls for her husband

relationships.char_1: Undermines her authority while maintaining facade of respect
relationships.char_2: Secretly glad about his financial troubles
relationships.char_3: Views her as a threat to control over Lucy
relationships.char_4: Offered him inside information for future favors
